Translations.Text: religi! - Religi de your patr Abraham. Li est 1 who nom vi Submitters originally! Tiel messenger serv witness vi vi dejxor witnesses among des popol. Do vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) ten fast DI; Li est your Lord put Lord put Supporter. . . [23:1] Successful ja est believers
who est reverent dum their Kontakt Prayers (Salat)
Nur kun their spouses those est rightfully theirs do ili hav sexual relations; ili ne est blamed

Ni kre human est el nepr kind da kot
Subsequently ni reproduced him tiny gut ej put protekt repository
